OOC: I don't know where they were last...so I'm going to start them 
in places of my Choosing.

IC:
//Ragnus//

  Things were not right in the circuts of the red dragon.  Things 
have fused, others have melted and to put it bluntly Ragnus was going 
insane.  No longer caring about his 'team' or the 
different 'factions' , Ragnus struck out on his own, perhaps to cause 
chaos, perhaps to fufill his own selfish needs.  

  He slowly makes his way across southern Europe looking for 
something.  What it is, he doesn't know. The only sure thing is that 
this 'something' is in trouble.


//Ultima//

  The hunt so far for he deranged twin, hadn't gone well. For every 
clue she found, there were two paths to follow, and so far, it has 
always been the wrong path.

  The great silver dragon was now in her robot form searching 
throughout the Americas unsuccessfully.
